Welcome to my blog

Hi everyone, I am Qingming Li, a student majoring in Software Development in MITT. Actually this is my work and life blog where I am going to share my personal daily lifes and some professional techniques, such as my hobbies and interests, my ideas about the techniques that were used in this field. If you are a new comer in this field, it is right choice to follow me! In addition, if you are a big fan of diving or skiing, it is also right choice to jion me!

the beautiful sea-view sceneries and awesome underwater world in Indonesia.
